marklogic.body:
55 For my flesh is true food, and my blood is true drink. 56 Whoever feeds on my flesh and drinks my blood abides in me, and I in him. I need to rely completely on Christ and abide in his word.
Every single time I try to do things my way, I fail. The only plan that Always comes to fruition is God's, and I need to surrender to that completely! My relationship with Jesus Christ is the only thing that can satisfy, the only thing that will erase my hunger and quench my Thirst. I'm praying that I'l rely on him in everything I do.
